title: A proclamation by his Excellency the Lord Generall, for the regulating of souldiers in their march to Ireland.
author: Fairfax, Thomas Fairfax, Baron, 1612-1671.
publisher: Printed for John Playford, and are to be sold at his shop in the Inner Temple,
notes: Signed and dated at end: T. Fairfax. 17 March 1648.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
